message.heading: I'm from the future. I came here in a Time Machine that you invented. Now I need your help to get back to the year 1985.

message.heading: So you're my Uncle Joey. Better get used to these bars, kid.

message.heading: If my calculations are correct, when this baby hits 88 miles per hour... you're gonna see some serious shit.
